item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: December 2, 2024 Today's Verse 2 Samuel 22:31 [31] This Godâ€”his way is perfect; the word of the LORD proves true; he is a shield for all those who take refuge in him. Today's Memory Verse Ephesians 6:12 - For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.
